Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Amazing vegan food and the staff are lovely! Reasonably priced. This was close to our airbnb and became our morning regular but I would happily hop on a tram or bus if we were further out as the coffee is unreal.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Enjoyed really delicious fresh vegan croissants yesterday morning in this cosy small establishment. The dough was very crunchy and the taste can easily compete with the non-vegan varieties. Good coffee too. ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: The staff are really nice and friendly. The cakes are moist 100% vegan. Banana‚Äôs pancakes are so delicious. The sandwiches are fresh and refreshing. Really nice place.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: It is a cozy place, but the service is quite slow. Passion fruit cheesecake was delicious, the lemon cake on the other hand was a bit dry.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text:
Most friendly staff and delicious cakes! :)
Can only recommend the chocolate cake and Smokey tofu sandwich

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Really good food!, the coffee and the food/cake all tasted fresh. I‚Äôm a meat eater and enjoyed the meal. They accept card .

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text:
Just wow!
We tried smoked tofu sandwich, croissant and chocolate cake with pistachio, chai lattes and oolong tea. Amazing taste, cozy place and nice staff! 10/10 must go when in Amsterdam.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Really cute and cosy cafe near the Westergasfabriek. Everything on the menu is vegan, home-made and what I had was yummy. I had a cacao chai with oat mylk which was delicious. Not too sweet and nice and creamy. I also had a latte with ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Amazing chai coffee and breakfast! Everything is completely vegan, which is fantastic. The 'Gladiator Breakfast' was the perfect thing to set me up for a busy day of Amsterdam sightseeing. See you again soon :)

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Best place in Amsterdam for cake and lattes! Go for the high tea; it's absolutely amazing. Everything is freshly baked, moist and nothing tastes 'vegan', so good place to bring vegans and non-vegans alike.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Really nice and cozy place, 100% vegan. Banana‚Äôs pancakes, pistacchio‚Äôs cake and ‚Äúfrittata‚Äù sandwich are very good.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Located right in front of the Westerpark, Koffie ende Koeck has a nice cozy atmosphere perfect for an afternoon tea. I ordered their banana pancakes, which was the perfect portion for one. The pancakes were fluffy but a little bit too sweet ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text:
First time I came and I ate vegan food really.
The bagels were good and I loveeeeeed the chocolate cake ! You should try it definitely! ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Service is slow, we were left standing for ages, not attended. The cake was dry. The menu was dirty full of drink stains. The atmosphere and the interior of the place are cosy though.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Heard lots about this place but the champion breakfast wasn't available unfortunately. ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: best. cafe. ever. i don‚Äôt care if you‚Äôre vegan - go here!!! the dirty chai is the best i‚Äôve ever had and i got a gluten free cake, which is divine. everything looks yummy

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text:
Amazing coffee and cake
The high tea was a great experience ü§ó
The scone was super delicious and the staff was super friendly
Price was really good too

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Super cute place, nice staff, good coffee. The sunny side sandwich was surprising! Very nice. Only downside croassiant was not the best, but I'm a former baker and have high standards on my croassiants ;)

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Really amazing vegan food but sadly bad organization and serivice. Maybe a good idea to call the customers if they're late for their reservation before giving the food away ;)

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text:
The service is SO slow and the coffee is pretty gross and over priced, even by non dairy standards.
Their cakes are pretty good.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Calm atmosphere, beautiful plants and decor. Welcoming atmosphere and very helpful staff and what a play list! Excellent way to start the day in Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text:
Wow, I wish I had found this place earlier!
- extremely nice vibe, the staff is super friendly, quiet music, it feels homey! ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: If you are in Amsterdam you need to visit this little cafe and if you are Vegan and in Amsterdam then you NEED to visit this cafe. This vegan cafe is so incredible, the food, the service, the feel of it everything was a 10/10. We are here ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Nice place for vegan treats & tea! (Also some gluten free options) The cafe is quite small but cozy :)

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: I tried a choco chai and a pastry. The drink is so unique, the pastry is warm. Perfect breakfast.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: This is the first place we visited when my wife and I came to Amsterdam. They open at 11 due to COVID which is perfect for brunch. The staff were so friendly and helpful, as if you were friends for years, and being a completely vegan place, ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Quality of products are good but the service specially when it's busy is horrible, 4 people in the line and takes 30 minutes plus for your turn, that's not okay. I advise you to stay away from here if you see more than one person standing ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Lovely caf√© with delicious cakes and great coffee ‚Äì also for vegans!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Lovely atmosphere! Great pastries and one of the best croissants I've had. If you're vegan (or not) it's a must visit!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: BEST SCONES I'VE EVER HAD! This all plant-based restaurant was one of our favorite stops when visiting Amsterdam, and perfect for an overcast rainy day. The neighborhood was outside of the typical tourist area and was very charming. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: This a cute little cafe with a great tea selection. The coffee and cake is vegan. The staff were very nice and the service was pretty good. The coffee is ok for Amsterdam - if you‚Äôre a coffee fanatic I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place, but if ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: We went for vegan high tea and it has been the highlight of our trip! The food was delicious and the tea was amazing! There were so many options. Some of our favorites were the tofu sandwich, the frittata, the scones and the chocolate cake. I highly recommend visiting this restaurant.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Amazing!  Everything was super delicious.  I had a perfect oat milk latte, smoky tofu sandwich on sourdough and passion fruit cheesecake.  The tastiest vegan food i've had in Amsterdam.  Staff is also great and location is cosy.  Loved it!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Best vegan Cafe in Amsterdam. Very beautiful and quiet shop. The staff is very nice and accommodating. ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: The oatmeal brulee is the best oatmeal you'll ever have. Amazing!! 100% vegan and had paper straws. ü•á

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: I've been vegan for 6 years and this place definitely has the best vegan treats I've ever had! The cakes and cookies were incredible but nothing beats their hot chocolate, which is just out of this world!! The staff are lovely and the fit-out is cozy and inviting. If you're in Amsterdam do not miss this place!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: We came across this place on our last day in Amsterdam and I wish I had discovered it earlier! We only tried three baked goods and a coffee but all were delicious. Some of if not the best baked goods we've had (vegan or not!). If you're looking to have coffee/a small meal with some friends I'd highly recommend you visit

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: best brownies I have ever eaten (of vegan and non-vegan ones). Also their vegan cheese cake is amazing, better than other's I've had in Amsterdam.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: I highly recommend this cafe, great selection of vegan cakes, sandwiches, croissants, cookies and more. Very friendly staff as well.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: My boyfriend and I absolutely loved this cute little spot! We had a piece of a floral cake & apple crumble. My boyfriend says all other non-dairy Cappuccinos in the future will be measured up to this one, and my Chai latte was amazing as well. The owner(?) was also so sweet, thank you so much!!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Quaint, quirky coffee and tea shop. Everyone working had the happiest mood which was quite infectious. I ate the tofu sandwich with pickles and homemade mayo on sourdough. It was very tasty. I'd like to go back for the afternoon tea!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Fantastic vegan scones and service!! The scones were served hot sprinkled with powdered sugar and came up with really delicious jam and vegan cream. Better than the tea and scones I had in London!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Lovely little vegan cafe. The staff are really nice and friendly and the cakes are moist and tasty. It is also just opposite Westerpark, which is great, if you want to go for a stroll after.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Outstanding! I‚Äôve eaten three things on the menu in one sitting and i am contemplating having more! Everything is so delicious.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Wohw, what a stunning experience üòç! Maartje turns her passion and magic chef skills in super tasteful soul food üôèüòÉ. ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: The service is not the best, made an hour drive to eat a slice of cake for my birthday they open at 9.30 and at 11 there was no cake available. Lost 2.30 hours of the day to eat a dry croissant and a terrible espresso(sure we are used to the coffee in Italy) and price compared to what you get is a bit high.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: The cakes are to die for!!! Loved it. We will definitely come back. The staff was friendly and helpful.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: The coffe was great, but those pancakes that everyone is giving great reviews about where not freshly made, cold and dry. Then they used a kind of sirup that was to sweet and not the tasty maple sirup - we were very disapointed.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: This place is the perfect small breakfast place. I am vegan travelling abroad and was delighted to discover this little cafe. The food was even pretty! The croissants were the best!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Lovely cafe with a great choice in vegan drinks and cakes that are so delicious.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Cinnamon bun is amazing, location small and gorgeous even if it can get crowded. Service very friendly, cakes are simply great. Missing the cinnamon  bun fresh everyday to get the 5th star!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Quaint, friendly and delicious, this coffee place is really nice. The sandwiches and scones are to die for. I had a 'high tea' and I really recommend it! Last but definitely not least: VEGAN!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: This small gem was only one block away from our ABNB we picked it based on other reviews and we were not disappointed.. the lentil soup was the best I ever had and the pancakes were too beautiful to eat! We are going back tomorrow for the oatmeal and the cakes.. do not miss out on this place!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Amazing little vegan gem, the staff is super friendly and attentive, they were able to whip up a delicious meal for me from scratch despite several good restrictions. Great selection of vegan pastries, and super comfy interior!!!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Love love this place. Cozy set up with outdoor seating for the summer. Amazing avocado rice cake layered dish. The cake is dreamy and one of the nicest vegan cakes I've had.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Such a great vegan menu with loads of options for everyone! The staff were lovely, the vibe in the cafe was relaxed and the food was great! Our favourite spot in Amsterdam!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Just no. We were waiting 15min for someone to come and say hi and take our order but nothing. I then went to the desk and asked if I can order here instead and was told they will come and take our order. Waited another 10min and no one ‚Ä¶

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Yummy cake, tasty sandwich and super nice staff :)

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Super cozy and cute:) good drinks and lovely cake, just that for me personally I prefer cakes a bit more dense xD

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Wow, I ordered a vegan, gluten free and sugar free chocolate, hazelnut cake and it was the most delicious cake I have eaten in my life!!! Absolutely loved it! I can highly recommend it!!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Good service, warm atmosphere, delicious vegan food. One good gluten free option. I recommend both fritattas they serve. The speculaas are really really good.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: The pancakes that everyone is giving great reviews about where not freshly made, cold and dry. Then they used a kind of sirup that was to sweet and not the tasty maple sirup - we were very disapointed.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: I just called to order a Cake for my birthday, they did such a great job! It was a beautiful cake, delicious, fresh and VEGAN! I'm super happy with it and I totally recommend it!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Found this cafe on our first morning in Amsterdam and enjoyed a delicious brunch, the sourdough, chickpea flour omelette was so good. Would highly recommend

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Their lemon poppy seed cake is delicious, the service quite friendly, and the atmosphere is cozy.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Good coffe and fantastic cake selection. Went with some nice fruit toast and was not disappointed after my rainy day ride. Very friendly as well, made it feel like I was at a friend's house

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Kind and helpful staff and delicious vegan cakes. Highly recommended.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Small cafe. Nice and friendly. Next to a really lovely park, so it's worth getting to the area. Had a croissant that was  good and a muffin that was nice. Completely vegan.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Following all the great reviews, I walked there from the centre looking forward to a sumptuous healthy breakfast at 10am to find that it was closed with a handwritten message on the door in Dutch. I walked back and found a veg place in Damrak at 1pm. A sad morning. I recommend phoning them beforehand.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Amazing cakes and coffee. Cozy atmosphere and very nice attitude. Good place to go for a vegan treats.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Love the food here. Nice place for a cheat day. Service a bit slow but if you're not in a rush it's a great place for an afternoon tea or morning coffee with some sweets.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Had the high tea for 5 people, with many different teas. Quite a bit of food, nice mix of sweet and savoury.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: I had a delicious vegan high tea at this place. It was great and I would definitely recommend it for both vegans and non-vegans!

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Nice place, good selection of vegan food but go early to grab a choc croissant to avoid disappointment. Pancakes amazing.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: The most delicious vegan cafe -- magical pastries, sandwiches, soup, cake, and the best hazelnut milk latte I have ever had.

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Lovely place,  delicious all vegan menu. Afternoon tea available  (reservation needed).

Name: Koffie ende koecke
Review Text: Amazing little vegan cafe, great atmosphere and amazing cakes. Worth the trip out of centrum
